description: Auto Multiple Choice - multiple choice papers management
details:
Utility to manage multiple choice questionnaires, with optionnaly
 mixed questions and answers. AMC provides automatic marking from papers'
 scans. Annotated papers are produced. Marks can be exported as a
 OpenOffice.org sheet file.
 interface::commandline, interface::x11, made-of::tex, role::program,
 scope::utility, uitoolkit::gtk, use::learning, use::scanning,
 use::typesetting, use::viewing, works-with-format::tex,
 works-with::text, x11::application
